The client has a history of anaphylactic reactions"Potential contraindications" = "History of anaphylactic reactions""Potential contraindications" = "History of anaphylactic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.DTPcontraindications * Tabs: DTP
Seasonal influenza vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Seasonalinfluenzacontraindications * Tabs: Seasonalinfluenza
Do not vaccinate client with seasonal influenza if client has had a severe allergic reaction (e.g. anaphylaxis) after a previous dose or to a vaccine component.Do not vaccinate client with seasonal influenza if client has had a severe allergic reaction (e.g. anaphylaxis) after a previous dose or to a vaccine component.Do not vaccinate client with seasonal influenza if client has had a severe allergic reaction (e.g. anaphylaxis) after a previous dose or to a vaccine component.
